# Festival Technology Adoption 2020-2025

Timeline showing five major technology categories adopted by festivals.

## Technology Categories

- RFID Wristbands: 15% (2020) → 92% (2025)
- Mobile Ticketing: 8% (2020) → 95% (2025)
- Cashless Payments: 5% (2020) → 89% (2025)
- Facial Recognition: 2% (2020) → 42% (2025)
- AI Crowd Monitoring: 1% (2020) → 35% (2025)
- Dynamic Pricing: 0% (2020) → 28% (2025)
- Live Translation: 0% (2020) → 18% (2025)
- AR/VR Experiences: 3% (2020) → 22% (2025)
- Social Media Integration: 45% (2020) → 87% (2025)
- Sustainability Tracking: 8% (2020) → 51% (2025)

## Style

- Colors: Deep purple (#6B46C1), electric coral (#FF6B6B), sky blue (#4299E1), white (#FFFFFF)
- White space: 30%+ composition
- Typography: 16pt body text, 24pt year labels, clean sans-serif
- Context: Festival technology, RFID wristbands, mobile devices

## Structure

Horizontal timeline with 6 time points (2015, 2018, 2021, 2024, 2027, 2030). Each time point shows multiple technology adoption percentages. Color-coded lines connect same technology across years.
